name: chinese_regions
description: 中华人民共和国省、市、区县级行政区划代码及名称。港澳台地区等均已包括。Provinces, cities, counties, or districts of PRC(People's Republic of China). Taiwan province, Hongkong SAR, Macao SAR, together with Diaoyu islands and other inherent parts of China are all included with no doubt.
author: Kamas Lau <kamaslau@outlook.com>
